description:
Learning a foreign language can be quite challenging mainly when some sounds aren't familiar in your mother tongue. This course is for anyone - including complete beginners - preparing a trip (Holiday or Business) in France. It intends to make you more comfortable (speaking) when travelling in a French speaking country.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This course will also give you good foundations and teach you through several videos:

  • how to better express yourself
  • how to be better understood, whenever you will be at the station or even at the restaurant

Furthermore expressing yourself with "etre" (to be) or "avoir" (to have) will become after watching the materials given. Some useful idiomatic expressions, connectors and adverbs have also been added to some essential vocabulary printable (and extra material) - given here to help you express yourself more confidently.

Through diverse videos and several exercices strengthen your basis so you will feel more confident when expressing yourself in French.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Start today and I can guarantee that this course will be quite handy.

I will always answer your questions related to this course, to help you speak more confidently. What are you waiting for? Let's turn you into a confident speaker.
title: Speak & Write French effectively - Part I
